Sentencas: Gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) is a promising alternative electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells that offers the possibility of operation in the intermediate temperature range (773-1073 K).
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: To determine the optimal dopant concentration in GDC, we have employed a systematic approach of applying a 3D kinetic lattice Monte Carlo (KLMC) model of vacancy diffusion in conjunction with previously calculated activation energies for vacancy migration in GDC as inputs.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: KLMC simulations were performed including the vacancy repelling effects in GDC.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: Increasing the dopant concentration increases the vacancy concentration, which increases the ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: However, at higher concentrations, vacancy-vacancy repulsion impedes vacancy diffusion, and together with vacancy trapping by dopants decreases the ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: The maximum ionic conductivity is predicted to occur at approximate to 20% to 25% mole fraction of Gd dopant.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: Placing Gd dopants in pairs, instead of randomly, was found to decrease the conductivity by approximate to 50%.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: Overall, the trends in ionic conductivity results obtained using the KLMC model developed in this work are in reasonable agreement with the available experimental data.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach

Sentencas: This KLMC model can be applied to a variety of ceria-based electrolyte materials for predicting the optimum dopant concentration.
Titulo: Predicting the optimal dopant concentration in gadolinium doped ceria: a kinetic lattice Monte Carlo approach
